Title: Relates to disqualifications for holding civil office
Summary: Provides that a person convicted of certain felonies or offenses may not hold civil office or a position of leadership in a political party; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to disqualification for holding civil office or a position of leadership in a political party
